item.title: About
item.description: I’m Pablo GÃ³mez-Caldito, I love building tools, products and infrastructure using software. My work experience is mainly in SRE, increasing the reliability of online services and implementing the DevOps philosophy in organizations. I also release Open-Source Software projects and have fun learning about Information Security. Currently working as Senior DevOps Engineer at Streamsets and previously at idealista. You can check my resume to learn more. Contact Email pablo@caldito.me Other GitHub Twitter LinkedIn.
